english.segment1: My fee areplanted I can't fly. I'd like to moonwalk through the sky. I'd like to tiptoe past this atmosphere
english.segment2: And so I gaze past satellites. Past suns and stars and endless nights. It's clear to me, I see I'm small
english.segment3: Compared to You I'm nothing at all
english.segment4: Beyond the depths of space and time. You built these things that remind. Setting suns and shooting stars. Say who You are
english.segment5: You're the Lonestar. And I'll lift my head up to the sky. Your hand of greatness touches mine. I'll be content, I know I'm small
english.segment6: Compared to You I'm nothing at all
